name: Fireeze
description:
FIREEZE - Elemental twins

Izyk and Feyre, the twin brothers, have just arrived at the ruins of Fireeze.

An inscription on the door says: “May the flame light your way. May the ice hold your steps”.

They keep walking, ready to explore that ancient, forgotten place.

Controllers:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Change the character
  • Mouse clicks - Shoot on an element

Credits:

  • Codes - Dani Rodríguez
  • Graphics - Raúl Vivar
  • Musics - Fran Romguer
